name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At the Chengdu Twin Towers New Year's Eve party, a girl waved a rainbow flag and was later stopped by the police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Shenzhen: New Year's Eve in the Dark
On the evening of December 31, citizens went to shopping malls such as Yifang Tiandi to participate in the New Year's Eve countdown.
Unexpectedly, the mall suddenly turned off the big screen in the last few minutes before the New Year's Eve, trying to evacuate the crowd.
But people did not leave, but counted down together in front of the black screen and wished each other a happy new year.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/bnrBOJ9wOu

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Some netizens discovered that in 2021, Yuhuayuan School in Ningling County was featured on Henan Minsheng TV's "Xiao Li Helps" program because a teacher instigated the entire class to bully two students.
At the time, the principal who was beaten was at the mediation site and denied that the above behavior occurred in the school.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Images posted by residents of Ningling County on December 31:
The main road was closed by police, and vehicles were asked to turn around
The highway intersection was also closed, and many vehicles were stuck at the intersection.
At night, the police on duty gathered in front of the hood of the police car to eat boxed lunches.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 31, Caixin.com published an article titled "Farewell in 2023", which was later deleted. According to screenshots circulated online, the article mainly counted the people who died in 2023, and the first photo was of Li Keqiang.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Shijiazhuang, drone show canceled, organizer kneels down and kowtows to apologize. 
On January 1, the New Year's Eve drone show in Xinhua District, Shijiazhuang, Hebei was temporarily canceled, causing dissatisfaction among the citizens who had been waiting for hours. Someone in the crowd shouted "Kneel down! One person cannot kneel down, everyone must kneel down" and then an organizer knelt down to apologize.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 31, Zhangzhou, Fujian. Firefighters used water cannons to extinguish fireworks being set off on both sides of the road, and then used water cannons to drive away the crowd.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 31, Jiujiang City, Jiangxi Province. An electric car was driving at high speed while setting off fireworks, and a police car was chasing behind it. Passersby shouted "Awesome!"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: January 1, Jiangsu. Two men tried to recreate the Jiangxi myth in front of the traffic police, and several traffic police on the roadside immediately rushed over and pulled the two men out of the car and took them away.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 1, in Ganzhou City, Jiangxi Province, a man set off fireworks in the Long March Square. Several police officers rushed to arrest him and a chase ensued.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 31, in Tengzhou, Shandong, several policemen dragged a man who set off fireworks into a police car. One of the policemen scolded the passers-by: If you set off fireworks again, I will detain you. Do you know that it is not easy for the staff? The passers-by retorted: Isn’t it normal to set off fireworks during the New Year?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 31, at Tangjiang Bridge in Ganzhou, Jiangxi, a man was walking with an unlit firework in his hand. Passersby reminded him to run away because there were policemen around. The man ran away, and several policemen chased him.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 31, Xi'an. The New Year's Eve event was suddenly cancelled when it was almost time, and the public cursed in public

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 1, residents of the Central Lake Park of Guangzhou University Town protested against forced demolition. "Guangzhou University Town forcibly demolished my home. I have been homeless for 20 years. I have been protected by people from all walks of life and have nowhere to turn to for help. Down with corruption, down with bribery. Long live the Communist Party of China."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
January 1, Shantou, Guangdong: New Year's Eve in the dark.
People gathered at Suning Plaza to wait for the New Year's Eve, but the organizer turned off the screen at around 23:40, causing confusion among the people.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
January 1, Yantai, Shandong: New Year's Eve in the dark.
On that day, a large number of citizens waited in Joy City early to wait for the New Year countdown, but when there were about three minutes left, the mall suddenly turned off the screen.
Later, the official responded that the countdown event in the outer square was cancelled due to public security control requirements.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
January 1, Shanghai Xintiandi
There were no screens, no fireworks, people gathered together spontaneously to count down and cheer for the New Year.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/qGeWgVxmOZ

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A local blogger in Wuhan complained about the local ban on New Year’s Eve: With such a good opportunity to boost consumption and promote employment, are we scared to death by the flow of people on New Year’s Day?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Nanning, in the last few minutes, suddenly notified that the New Year's Eve countdown was cancelled

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 1, a front-line employee of Sinopec Xuzhou Branch, who had been working since 1980, released a video to report the survival problems of Sinopec's front-line employees, and angrily scolded the leaders for being ruthless. He said that there were no holidays or overtime pay during the Chinese New Year and other holidays, but instead there were various fines and oppression, which made him miserable. Sinopec's wealth was earned by front-line workers, but they had low incomes, while the leaders stayed in air-conditioned rooms but enjoyed huge year-end bonuses.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 1, Sina Finance released the top 20 Chinese companies by market value. TSMC was the Chinese company with the highest market value, which caused ridicule among netizens.
